title: POtHS - End Times - 88 - Understanding the Ark of the Covenant
description:
The Ark Files - Understanding the Ark of the Covenant, parts 1-10:
In this truly eye-awakening and thought-provoking presentation, the author discusses the real significance of the Ark of the Covenant and its importance in worship, even as identified in the books of Revelation and Daniel, and the relationship to our Heavenly future.  

What does the Ark represent or mean to you?

Would your answer be ... the Ark could possibly represent or picture Jesus Christ, the "Messiah?"  Or would you say, it represents namely, JehovahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Holy "Presence" with the nation of Israel?  Or, do you believe it could possibly represent Almighty God's Universal Power & His Visible Rulership over mankind, through the nation of Israel?  To be sure, these are all excellent answers to such a question; howver, let's see if we can provide any additional insight answering the question.

Episodes in this series include...
1.  The Beginning
2.  What The Ark Is
3.  What Did The Ark Look Like
4.  The King Of The Ark
5.  The Ark In The Sanctuary
6.  The Ark In Wars
7.  The Ark And The Feast Days
8.  The Time Prophecy
9.  The Ark And The Third Temple
10. Paul and the law
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Testimony of the Ark:
In a film by Carl Erik Tengesdal, he presents the importance of the Ark of the Covenant and how the antichrist will set himself in the temple of God as if he was God himself.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

The Sanctuary:
After God rescued the Israelites from captivity in Egypt and after He gave them His Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai, He then instructed them to build a portable sanctuary/tabernacle, so that He could dwell among them, and which they were to carry with them during their 40 years of wandering in the wilderness of Sinai. The sanctuary is thought by many to be just another Old Testament story that is irrelevant today. But in reality it is a detailed picture of the plan of salvation for all of humanity, specifically it shows how God deals with the problem of sin in mankind, and it reveals how we are to come to God to receive forgiveness and cleansing from all sin.

"Your way, O God, is in the sanctuary." Psalm 77:13
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

The 10 Commandments:
A folder containing 10 short videos discribing the 10 Commandments and their relationship to us today.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Signs - Part 76:
A folder series compiled of various short clips presenting recent apocalyptic signs occurring around the world today to help us identify the state of affairs ushering the end of days.  View what's been happening in our time and descern for yourself the onset of Revelations and what still may lay ahead before the comming of our Lord
